start.text: I just pushed an AI into the water... I saved your ass!!!!

askAI.text: Yeah I know about Closed AI, I used to work there
askAI.name: Employee

askName.text: Name? Call me whatever you want.

work.text: I used to work at Closed AI, if u were wondering.
work.name: Employee

hate.text: Thats why I hate them so much.

explain2.text: Look around, can you even drink the water in the sea?

explain3.text: As a human you should be able to smell the shit stained air they created.
